name: Game Tournament - fight games
description:
Welcome to a legend fighting game!
Your goal is to become the legendary hero by beating every opponent and mastering the different abilities!

Take care of your hero/pet by training, with various mini games in the training area by earning great rewards, many jewels, combine different fruit, memorize cards of numbers, shoot the duck and more!

Upgrade your hero/pet abilities and give him different powers to use in the battle!
There are 3 different powers to use in game:

->Use your magic punch to smash and crush the enemy to the ground!
->Use the magic shield to protect you from the opponent
->Control the forces of nature to call down and strike your foes with a magic thunder!

Make sure you always restore your health by the ending of a battle!
Don't let your hero/pet fall in the hands of the enemy! Unlock different opponents and become master of the arena.
Train, fight, upgrade, think!

Join the most daring chase for glory, become a legend, become the champion of this amazing fighting games saga!

Great for kids all ages and everyone!
Hope you enjoy this free pixel art game! Have fun!
